name: Human Spider
description:
Inspired by the train scene from Spider-Man 2, Human Spider is an arcade style button mashing game where your goal is to survive for as long as possible and gain a high score. The game was developed over the course of 2 weekends for the itch.io Movie Game Jam  https://itch.io/jam/moviegamejam

Mash the space bar key to survive!

Artwork and animations created by:   https://itch.io/profile/corrida
